title: Chronic Respiratory Disease Rehabilitation Education: Teach the Teacher (TtT) Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and respiratory diseases
context.additional_context: A training program for pre-service and in-service teachers to cultivate educators capable of disseminating chronic respiratory disease rehabilitation programs in communities, conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles and implementation methods of Pulmonary Rehabilitation (PR) for chronic respiratory diseases.
Learners can develop and apply PR educational materials using online platforms.
Learners can design community-tailored PR programs and write project-based evaluation reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
